sentences.sentence: Looking gaunt and tired, he denied there was anything to worry about.
sentences.translation: 他看上去憔悴而又疲劳，却否认有烦心事。

sentences.sentence: I know not what the younger dreams—some vague Utopia—and she seems, when withered old and skeleton-gaunt, an image of such politics.
sentences.translation: 我不知道年轻一代的梦想是什么——某种模糊的乌托邦——而当她憔悴衰老、骨瘦如柴时，她似乎就是这种政治的化身。
不管怎样，你看上去很憔悴。
